backend/main.mo: Marketplace canister implementing user and vendor profile CRUD with authorization checks and vendor verification logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module initializing empty maps and counters for user profiles and vendors when upgrading from an older actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Phase 2 frontend features to files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH color tokens, theming variables, and base layout rules for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML root document loading the React app entrypoint and setting basic metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines all application routes, authentication and role-mode protection, and wraps pages in the main layout and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Authentication UI showing sign-in and sign-out buttons with principal display and logout redirection.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper component enforcing Internet Identity authentication and rendering a sign-in prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Route guard redirecting authenticated users to role selection if no role mode is chosen.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Shared layout with header, main content slot, and footer attribution used across all pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Renders the main navigation header with links, role badges, and auth controls, adapting options based on user identity and role mode.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectio: Displays backend connection and authentication status, showing loading, error, and identity checks using various hooks.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorPro: Form for creating or editing vendor products with validation, state management, and mutation calls to backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceQueries: React Query hooks for marketplace operations like fetching products, vendor profiles, and creating/updating items, with many placeholders for unimplemented backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines backend status, running state, and identity queries, mostly returning placeholders until backend methods are implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleMode.ts: Manages persisted role mode (admin or vendor) via localStorage with helpers to set and clear the mode.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS custom properties for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Displays a placeholder admin dashboard with planned feature cards and a connection status component.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with navigation to products and role selection plus Phase 1 feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product information with loading/error states, image display, and vendor lookup placeholder logic.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProductsPage.ts: Fetches and displays public product listings with search, category filtering, and status alerts.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectPage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to choose admin or vendor mode and navigates accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/VendorLayoutPage.tsx: Provides the vendor dashboard layout with tab navigation between profile and products, rendering children within a styled container.
frontend/src/pages/VendorPlaceholderPage: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/VendorProductsPage.ts: Displays the vendorâ€™s products with loading/error states, product cards, and dialogs for creating or editing products.
frontend/src/pages/VendorProfilePage.tsx: Loads and edits vendor profile data with a form, handling save success and error states.
frontend/src/types/marketplace.ts: Defines marketplace product types including Product and ProductId used across the frontend.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, plugins, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project's phase, existing features, architectural notes, and known issues for planning.
